title: Hans-Günter Neues
text: Hans-Günter Neues (14 November 1950 – 16 November 2016) was a German <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach. As a player, he spent nine seasons in the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> with <a href="SC%20Fortuna%20K%C3%B6ln">SC Fortuna Köln</a>, <a href="Rot-Weiss%20Essen">Rot-Weiss Essen</a> and <a href="1.%20FC%20Kaiserslautern">1. FC Kaiserslautern</a>. In 1983, he played with the <a href="Toronto%20Nationals%20%28soccer%29">Toronto Nationals</a> of the <a href="Canadian%20Professional%20Soccer%20League%20%281983%29">Canadian Professional Soccer League</a>. He died of cancer in 2016.
